remarks: An associative property between group multiple and ring multiplication for semirings.  (Contributed by AV, 23-Aug-2019.)
statement:
srgmulgass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
srgmulgass.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
srgmulgass.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
srgmulgass $p |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( ( N .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( N .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) $.
